metadata.title: USN-5520-1 -- HTTP-Daemon vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that HTTP-Daemon incorrectly handled certain crafted requests. A remote attacker could possibly use this issue to perform an HTTP Request Smuggling attack.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5520-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libhttp-daemon-perl - 6.01-1ubuntu0.1 No subscription required
